```{r setup, include=FALSE}
# Display plots on next slide in IOslides
# smaller in the above YAML must be off to make this work.

library(knitr)
local({
  hook_plot = knit_hooks$get('plot')
  knit_hooks$set(plot = function(x, options) {
    paste0('\n\n----\n\n', hook_plot(x, options))
  })
})
```
